task.title: Building Bird House
task.shortdesc: Building a birdhouse is a perfect activity for everyone in a family.

taskbody.prereq:
To build a birdhouse, you will need:
Pieces of wood
Set of tools

context.p: Birdhouses provide safe location for birds to build nests and raise their young.

step.cmd: Lay out the dimensions for the birdhouse elements.
Drill a 1 ½" diameter hole for the bird entrance on the front.
step.info: You need to look at the drawing for the correct placement of the bird entrance.

step.cmd: Join all the elements as per the drawing. You can choose any one of the following options:

chrow.chdesc: You may need a hammer to push the nails in the wood.Use the nail and hammer carefully to avoid any injuies.
Using a Super Glue is quick and easy.Do not spill the Super Glue and avoid physical contact.
Use ½" hinges. For shopping hinges online, see shopping ½" hinges on Google.

taskbody.result: You now have a beautiful new birdhouse.
taskbody.postreq: Find a good place to mount the bird house.
